tool_description:
This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database. The API allows you to -

Fetch vehicle details registered against an RC number
Find the name of the vehicle’s owner
Check class of vehicle
Verify registration date of the vehicle
name: Vehicle RC Verification Advanced
title: Vehicle RC Verification Advanced

api_list.name: RC verification advanced - async
api_list.description:
This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database. The API allows you to -

Fetch vehicle details registered against an RC number
Find the name of the vehicle’s owner
Check class of vehicle
Verify registration date of the vehicle
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-verification-advanced.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_rc_plus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-rc-verification-advanced.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-verification-advanced.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_rc_plus"
